column4: i was trying to install mplayer when i got this error: mplayer: [libggi2 but it is not installable] [liblame0 but it is not installable] [libpango1.0-0 (>=1.18.3) but 1.18.2-0ubuntu1 will be installed] [libpulse0 but it is not installable] [libx264-54  but it is not installable]. Does somebody could help me?
you can tab complete stuff in apt-get commands
